thread.title: Rachael Jones
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Rachael Jones

author: Rachael Jones
title: Rachael Jones
text: My shopping experience at Peaches Boutique was truly wonderful. I purchased a prom dress for my daughter. From the first phone call with them, to receiving the dress, everyone I had contact with was helpful, informative and knowledgeable. They even went above and beyond in advising how to care for the dress once it was received. I was able to track the shipping online and the dress arrived in a timely fashion. I am very happy to have been introduced to Peaches by a friend. I will not shop anywhere else for our formal wear needs again - we are Peaches shoppers for life!
